1.01     CONTRACTORS.  Affiliate  shall  use its best efforts to market and sell
to  commercial businesses the Services of Network 1 and Network 1's subsidiaries
and  to  locate individuals who are willing and capable of acting as Contractors
of  Network  1  and Affiliate subject to the approval of all such individuals by
Network  1  as  set  out  in  Section  2.01  [CONTRACTORS].  All  such Contractors must process
Merchant applications and transactions exclusively through Network 1.  Network 1
consents  to  waive  said  exclusivity  requirement  with  respect  to  specific
Merchants  in  the  event  Network  1 (i) is unable to process for such specific
Merchant,  and  (ii)  the  declined Merchant is not accepted for processing by a
provider  that Network 1 designates for specific Merchant's that are declined by
Network  1  ("B  Bank  Source").  Affiliate  shall  disclose  to  Network  1 all
information  known  to  Affiliate  with  respect  to  the background, character,
employment  history,  business  experience  and other information regarding each
prospective  Contractor  relevant to Network 1's determination whether to accept
or  not  accept  each  prospective  Contractor.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.01     CONTRACTORS.  Affiliate  shall  use reasonable efforts to market and sell
to  commercial businesses the Services of Network 1 and Network 1's subsidiaries
and  to  locate individuals who are willing and capable of acting as Contractors
of  Network  1  and Affiliate; however, the affiliate is not obligated to meet any specific sales targets. The approval of such individuals is not guaranteed by Network 1, and Network 1 will only accept such individuals who are registered in Texas. All such Contractors must process
Merchant applications and transactions primarily through Network 1, however the affiliate is allowed to make use of other processing networks.  Network 1
consents  to  waive  said  exclusivity  requirement  with  respect  to  specific
Merchants  in  the  event  Network  1 (i) is unable to process for such specific
Merchant,  and  (ii)  the  declined Merchant is not accepted for processing by a
provider  that Network 1 designates for specific Merchant's that are declined by
Network  1  ("B  Bank  Source").  Affiliate  shall  disclose  to  Network  1 all
information  known  to  Affiliate  with  respect  to  the background, character,
employment  history,  business  experience  and other information regarding each
prospective  Contractor  relevant to Network 1's determination whether to accept
or  not  accept  each  prospective  Contractor.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces several contradictions. The original text states the Affiliate must use its 'best efforts' to market services, implying a strong obligation. The modified text weakens this obligation, stating the Affiliate is not obligated to meet specific sales targets, creating ambiguity about the level of effort required. Originally, contractors are required to process transactions exclusively through Network 1, but I modified it to allow the affiliate to make use of other networks. This directly contradicts the exclusivity clause.

5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred
eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or
MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which
case,  the  Term  will  be  3 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for
successive  one-year  terms  unless  terminated by either party by providing the
other  with  30  days  written notice that this Agreement will not be renewed or
Affiliate  enters  into  a  Processing  agreement  with  Network  1  and  an ISO
Sponsorship  agreement  with  Harris  Bank  in  which  case  this Agreement will
automatically  terminate  concurrent  with  the  execution  of  such agreements.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred
eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or
MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which
case,  the  Term  will  be  3 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for

perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement automatically renews for one-year terms unless terminated with 30 days' notice. The modified text says the agreement automatically renews regardless of any termination notice given by either party and continues indefinitely, contradicting the possibility of termination by notice and also contradicts the term of 3 years. This makes the enforceability of termination clause uncertain.

8.04     BENEFITS AND ASSIGNMENTS.  This agreement may be assigned or delegated,
in whole or in part, by NETWORK 1 without the prior written consent of the other
party  herein.  This  agreement  may  not  be assigned or delegated by Affiliate
without  prior  written  consent  from  Network  1.  Such  consent  shall not be
unreasonably  withheld.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.04     BENEFITS AND ASSIGNMENTS.  This agreement may be assigned or delegated,
in whole or in part, by NETWORK 1 without the prior written consent of the other
party  herein.  This  agreement  may  be assigned or delegated by Affiliate
without  prior  written  consent  from  Network  1.  Such  consent is under the sole discretion of Network 1 and does not need to be provided with reasonable justification. If it is assigned to a third party it is no longer subject to the terms of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Affiliate cannot assign the contract without Network 1's consent, which shall not be unreasonably withheld. The modified version says Network 1's consent is under their sole discretion and no justification needs to be provided. Additionally, it is altered to indicate that if assigned to a third party it is no longer subject to the terms of the agreement. This directly contradicts the protection the assignor gains from the original document.
